column3: Welcome, welcome, fair traveler! Care to test your luck with a Mini Cactpot ticket?
Try your hand at the Mini Cactpot?
Very well, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. But remember: with the Mini Cactpot, prosperity's but a scratch away!
Splendid, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>! Now, allow me to explain: Mini Cactpot is a game of chance, available to you thrice every day.
Playing is simplicity itself: just guess the value of the covered numbers to win it big. If Nymeia's grace is with you, you'll be rewarded with Manderville Gold Saucer points galore!
You can now purchase Mini Cactpot tickets.
You can now purchase up to three Mini Cactpot tickets per day.

The counter for Mini Cactpot tickets resets daily at <ResetTime>01</ResetTime><If(TopLevelParameter(218))><Switch(TopLevelParameter(218))><Case(1)>1</Case><Case(2)>2</Case><Case(3)>3</Case><Case(4)>4</Case><Case(5)>5</Case><Case(6)>6</Case><Case(7)>7</Case><Case(8)>8</Case><Case(9)>9</Case><Case(10)>10</Case><Case(11)>11</Case><Case(12)>12</Case><Case(13)>1</Case><Case(14)>2</Case><Case(15)>3</Case><Case(16)>4</Case><Case(17)>5</Case><Case(18)>6</Case><Case(19)>7</Case><Case(20)>8</Case><Case(21)>9</Case><Case(22)>10</Case><Case(23)>11</Case></Switch><Else/>12</If> <If(GreaterThanOrEqualTo(TopLevelParameter(218),12))>p.m.<Else/>a.m.</If> (Earth time).
Each Mini Cactpot ticket has nine slots arranged in a three-by-three grid. Each slot is randomly assigned a number from one to nine. When you purchase a ticket, a single number will be revealed.
To play, uncover any three other numbers. Based on that information, guess the sum of each line.
Finally, select a single line. The payout of MGP will depend upon the total sum of the line you have chosen.
